Pre-Game Insights: Michael O'Neill's young Northern Ireland squad head to Bulgaria for their second Nations League Group C3 game of the new campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bulgaria v Northern Ireland will take place on Sunday 8th September 2024.
Bulgaria v Northern Ireland will kick off at 5pm.
Unfortunately, this game has not been selected for broadcast in the UK.
You can also live stream Bulgaria v Northern Ireland online via ITVX.
You can listen to the match on BBC Radio Ulster.
Others: bet365 odds: Bulgaria (29/20) Draw (9/4) Northern Ireland (15/8)*
